text:
数年飾っておりましたので、上記以外に人によったら気になる部分があるかもしれない可能性も ご考慮くださいm(_ _)m
★できるだけ色々部分的に写真を撮りましたので、上記内容と写真にて、ご判断 ご検討をお願いいたします。
★撮影環境、ご覧いただく端末・モニターによっても、写真と実物の色味や濃淡が多少異なって見える場合がございます。 あらかじめご了承ください。
trans:
This item has been on display for several years, so please take into account the possibility that there might be areas of concern depending on individual preferences. m(_ _)m
★ I have taken as many detailed photos as possible, so please review both the descriptions and the photos carefully when making your decision.
★ Please note that the color and shade of the item may appear slightly different in the photos compared to the actual product, depending on the lighting during photography or the device/monitor you are viewing it on.
